com.practice.lcn.calc

Class FlashEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.practice.lcn.calc.FlashEffect

  • public class FlashEffect
extends java.lang.Object
    This class helps create a flash effect on the result display so that the calculator will be more realistic.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  FlashEffect.IFlashEffect
      function pointer to allow provide a generic callback after the flash effect is over.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long FLASH_DURATION
      time duration for the flash effect (in ms)
      static java.lang.Object LOCK
      lock of the flash effect to synchronize the equation result

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      obtain the singleton instance of FlashEffect object
      boolean isCompleted()
      check if the flash effect is completely rendered.
      void run(FlashEffect.IFlashEffect instance)
      run the flash effect on the result display
      void setCompleted(boolean completed)
      set the completion state.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        obtain the singleton instance of FlashEffect object

      • isCompleted

        public boolean isCompleted()
        check if the flash effect is completely rendered. This get operation is thread-safe.
        Returns:
        true if so; otherwise false
        See Also:
        completed

      • setCompleted

        public void setCompleted(boolean completed)
        set the completion state. This set operation is thread-safe.
        Parameters:
